item.description:
Aboard the MV Freedom Yacht in Downtown Boston. Cruise in the beautiful waters of Boston, while mingling with your friends with the best veiws of the Boston Skyline and dance the night away to the sounds of
MTV's DJ Rahul all the way from CHICAGO! The last party of Summer. Lets END SUMMER WITH A BANG!

MTV's DJ Rahul spinning the hottest House, Dubstep, Top-40, Hip-Hop, Latin, Mashups.

~ World Renowned PISON & Band preforming Live (Pison Khadgi has preformed at the hottest bars, lounges in the world, specializing in soft rock infusing a special sense of uniqueness)

~ Bostons Own DJ Hem & DJ Supreemz Opening Set
~ Artists YOKA, Supoks, Subaaz, Kelton Preforming Live!
~ Rooftop Hookah Deck
~ Complimentary Appetizers for the first Hour
~ Prizes for the Best Dressed
~ Belly Dancers

$25 Advanced Tickets $30 Regular

www.ultimatecruiseparty.eventbrite.com

Info:
M/V Freedom Cruise Boat
60 Rowes Wharf
Behind the Boston Harbor Hotel
item.name: Live music CRUISE PARTY!
